channel.title: Spiced-FX.com
channel.description:
Hey, Mr.Chris here. As some of you may know.
First off, don't ask why I'm not a moderator anymore, or why I'm no using my account, as there are plenty of stories/rumours about the forum.
Some of you may remember EliteGFX, my old graphics forum. Well, unfortunately, Bob Lablah, decided to get the password to the ftp, and delete everything. So I've decided to start again, with an entirely different forum url.
www.spiced-fx.com
I hope to see some of you good PS lovers there, and some new faces would be nice to have to!
See you there!
www.spiced-fx.com

@Mr.Chris wrote:

Yup, 'tis me.

I wish mopar would hurry up and give me mod again. I want to complete SOTW O
